library.name: TextEncoding
library.description: Encodes text into bytes and decodes bytes into text. Supports ASCII, ISO-8859-1, UTF8, UTF16, and UTF32 and endian/BOM variations.

enum.name: TextFormat
enum.description: Enum list of available encodings. Endian and BOM variations are passed in as separate parameters in places where these are used.

value.name: UNKNOWN
value.description: Encoding is unknown. Used when decoding, but not for encoding.

value.name: ASCII
value.description: The ASCII format (single-byte encoding with 7-bit values)

value.name: ISO_8859_1
value.description: The ISO-8859-1 encoding (single-byte encoding with 8-bit values)

value.name: UTF-8
value.description: The UTF-8 format. (variable-length encoding format. Characters are 1-4 bytes. Generally considered standard.

value.name: UTF-16
value.description: The UTF-16 format. (2-byte format with surrogate pairs)

value.name: UTF-32
value.description: The UTF-32 format. (4-byte format, each 4-bit integer is the Unicode code point)

class.name: EncodingException
class.description: Thrown when there is a problem performing a conversion.

function.name: convertBytesToText
function.description: Converts a list of bytes into a string.

arg.name: bytes
arg.description: A list of byte values from 0-255

arg.name: encoding
arg.description: An encoding to decode the bytes. If not specified, auto-detection will be attempted.

returns.description: The string of the decoded bytes.

function.name: convertTextToBytes
function.description: Converts a string into a byte list.

arg.name: value
arg.description: A string to encode into bytes.

arg.name: encoding
arg.description: The encoding to use for the conversion.

arg.name: includeBom
arg.description: Whether or not to include a BOM at the beginning of the byte list. Ignored if the format does not support a BOM. Default value is false when not specified.

returns.description: A list of byte values from 0 to 255.
